definition: ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: A thing that we need to celebrate much more than we are doing already.
sentences.chinese: 一樣值得我們進一步頌揚的東西。

sentences.english: The papers chorused the praises of the positive suggestions of the government.
sentences.chinese: 各大報紙不約而同地頌揚政府積極性的建議。

sentences.english: In the rebel s universe, death exalts injustice.
sentences.chinese: 在叛逆者的宇宙中，死亡頌揚不公。

sentences.english: The design celebrates the built-up , engineered landscape of the Garden site and the City of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 設計頌揚了花園基址和芝加哥城市已建成的工程景觀。

sentences.english: And the shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen.
sentences.chinese: 牧羊者返回後，爲他們聽到和見到的事情頌揚讚美神。

sentences.english: In praise of Character in the Bleak inhuman Loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 去頌揚布利克式非人孤獨的人物。

sentences.english: The poem, which appeared in 1890, is an exaltation of married love.
sentences.chinese: 寫於1890年的這首詩是對婚姻愛情的高度頌揚。

sentences.english: Throughout the company we celebrated customers and the teams that served customers.
sentences.chinese: 貫穿整個公司我們頌揚客戶和服務於客戶的團隊。

sentences.english: This is a formal eulogistic composition.
sentences.chinese: 這是一篇正式的頌揚性文章。

sentences.english: He made a speech of panegyric.
sentences.chinese: 他作了一個頌揚性的演講。

sentences.english: Every newspaper invariably speaks highly to the suggestion put forward by the government.
sentences.chinese: 各大報紙不約而同地頌揚政府積極性的建議。

sentences.english: And it should also celebrate bamboo capitalism more broadly.
sentences.chinese: 同時應該頌揚竹節資本主義更加廣泛。

sentences.english: But Enron was hailed as a great company purely on shareholder value.
sentences.chinese: 但是僅靠股東權益安然是一個值得頌揚的公司。

sentences.english: I would never-never-praise anyone else with you around.
sentences.chinese: 在你面前，我不能頌揚旁人。

sentences.english: This form venerates Avalokitesvara's mercy to protect sentient beings from harmful curses and poisons.
sentences.chinese: 此菩薩化身頌揚觀音拯救衆生於詛咒荼毒之慈悲。

sentences.english: In the rebels universe, death exalts injustice.
sentences.chinese: 在叛逆者的宇宙中，死亡頌揚不公。

definition: passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
to rebel against orthodoxy/to depart from established practices
